scripts.build: npm run build-scss && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.build-html: cp src/*.html dist/ && for i in dist/*.html;do inline-source --root ./src/static $i $i;done
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run server
scripts.watch: npm run watch-assets & npm run watch-scss & npm run watch-html
scripts.watch-scss: onchange 'src/scss/*.scss' -i -- npm run build-scss && npm run build-css
